<a id="HingeJoint3D"></a>

# HingeJoint3D

**Inherits:** [Joint3D](Joint3D.md) **\<** [Node3D](Node3D.md) **\<** [Node](Node.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

A physics joint that restricts the rotation of a 3D physics body around an axis relative to another physics body.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

A physics joint that restricts the rotation of a 3D physics body around an axis relative to another physics body. For example, Body A can be a [StaticBody3D](StaticBody3D.md) representing a door hinge that a [RigidBody3D](RigidBody3D.md) rotates around.

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

## Enumerations

<a id="enum_HingeJoint3D_Param"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration -->

enum **Param**: [ðŸ”—](#enum_HingeJoint3D_Param)

<a id="HingeJoint3D_constant_PARAM_BIAS"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Param](HingeJoint3D.md#enum_HingeJoint3D_Param) **PARAM_BIAS** = `0`

The speed with which the two bodies get pulled together when they move in different directions.<a id="HingeJoint3D_constant_PARAM_LIMIT_UPPER"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Param](HingeJoint3D.md#enum_HingeJoint3D_Param) **PARAM_LIMIT_UPPER** = `1`

The maximum rotation. Only active if [angular_limit/enable](HingeJoint3D.md#HingeJoint3D_property_angular_limit/enable) is ``true``.<a id="HingeJoint3D_constant_PARAM_LIMIT_LOWER"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Param](HingeJoint3D.md#enum_HingeJoint3D_Param) **PARAM_LIMIT_LOWER** = `2`

The minimum rotation. Only active if [angular_limit/enable](HingeJoint3D.md#HingeJoint3D_property_angular_limit/enable) is ``true``.<a id="HingeJoint3D_constant_PARAM_LIMIT_BIAS"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Param](HingeJoint3D.md#enum_HingeJoint3D_Param) **PARAM_LIMIT_BIAS** = `3`

The speed with which the rotation across the axis perpendicular to the hinge gets corrected.<a id="HingeJoint3D_constant_PARAM_LIMIT_SOFTNESS"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Param](HingeJoint3D.md#enum_HingeJoint3D_Param) **PARAM_LIMIT_SOFTNESS** = `4`

**Deprecated:** This property is never used by the engine and is kept for compatibility purpose.

<a id="HingeJoint3D_constant_PARAM_LIMIT_RELAXATION"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Param](HingeJoint3D.md#enum_HingeJoint3D_Param) **PARAM_LIMIT_RELAXATION** = `5`

The lower this value, the more the rotation gets slowed down.<a id="HingeJoint3D_constant_PARAM_MOTOR_TARGET_VELOCITY"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Param](HingeJoint3D.md#enum_HingeJoint3D_Param) **PARAM_MOTOR_TARGET_VELOCITY** = `6`

Target speed for the motor.<a id="HingeJoint3D_constant_PARAM_MOTOR_MAX_IMPULSE"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Param](HingeJoint3D.md#enum_HingeJoint3D_Param) **PARAM_MOTOR_MAX_IMPULSE** = `7`

Maximum acceleration for the motor.<a id="HingeJoint3D_constant_PARAM_MAX"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Param](HingeJoint3D.md#enum_HingeJoint3D_Param) **PARAM_MAX** = `8`

Represents the size of the [Param](HingeJoint3D.md#enum_HingeJoint3D_Param) enum.<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="enum_HingeJoint3D_Flag"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration -->

enum **Flag**: [ðŸ”—](#enum_HingeJoint3D_Flag)

<a id="HingeJoint3D_constant_FLAG_USE_LIMIT"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Flag](HingeJoint3D.md#enum_HingeJoint3D_Flag) **FLAG_USE_LIMIT** = `0`

If ``true``, the hinges maximum and minimum rotation, defined by [angular_limit/lower](HingeJoint3D.md#HingeJoint3D_property_angular_limit/lower) and [angular_limit/upper](HingeJoint3D.md#HingeJoint3D_property_angular_limit/upper) has effects.<a id="HingeJoint3D_constant_FLAG_ENABLE_MOTOR"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Flag](HingeJoint3D.md#enum_HingeJoint3D_Flag) **FLAG_ENABLE_MOTOR** = `1`

When activated, a motor turns the hinge.<a id="HingeJoint3D_constant_FLAG_MAX"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Flag](HingeJoint3D.md#enum_HingeJoint3D_Flag) **FLAG_MAX** = `2`

Represents the size of the [Flag](HingeJoint3D.md#enum_HingeJoint3D_Flag) enum.<hr class="classref-section-separator"/>

## Property Descriptions

<a id="HingeJoint3D_property_angular_limit/bias"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **angular_limit/bias** = `0.3` [ðŸ”—](#HingeJoint3D_property_angular_limit/bias)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_param**\ (\ param\: [Param](HingeJoint3D.md#enum_HingeJoint3D_Param), value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_param**\ (\ param\: [Param](HingeJoint3D.md#enum_HingeJoint3D_Param)\ ) <span class="const">const</span>

The speed with which the rotation across the axis perpendicular to the hinge gets corrected.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="HingeJoint3D_property_angular_limit/enable"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **angular_limit/enable** = `false` [ðŸ”—](#HingeJoint3D_property_angular_limit/enable)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_flag**\ (\ flag\: [Flag](HingeJoint3D.md#enum_HingeJoint3D_Flag), enabled\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **get_flag**\ (\ flag\: [Flag](HingeJoint3D.md#enum_HingeJoint3D_Flag)\ ) <span class="const">const</span>

If ``true``, the hinges maximum and minimum rotation, defined by [angular_limit/lower](HingeJoint3D.md#HingeJoint3D_property_angular_limit/lower) and [angular_limit/upper](HingeJoint3D.md#HingeJoint3D_property_angular_limit/upper) has effects.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="HingeJoint3D_property_angular_limit/lower"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **angular_limit/lower** = `-1.5707964` [ðŸ”—](#HingeJoint3D_property_angular_limit/lower)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_param**\ (\ param\: [Param](HingeJoint3D.md#enum_HingeJoint3D_Param), value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_param**\ (\ param\: [Param](HingeJoint3D.md#enum_HingeJoint3D_Param)\ ) <span class="const">const</span>

The minimum rotation. Only active if [angular_limit/enable](HingeJoint3D.md#HingeJoint3D_property_angular_limit/enable) is ``true``.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="HingeJoint3D_property_angular_limit/relaxation"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_param**\ (\ param\: [Param](HingeJoint3D.md#enum_HingeJoint3D_Param), value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_param**\ (\ param\: [Param](HingeJoint3D.md#enum_HingeJoint3D_Param)\ ) <span class="const">const</span>

The lower this value, the more the rotation gets slowed down.
